# Get gene selections

```{r read-selection-gene-basis, message = FALSE}


# read gene selection 
gene_selections.files = list.files(path=paste0(root.dir , "data/gene_selection__optional_PCA/" , system , "/"))
genes = lapply(gene_selections.files , function(current.file){
  out = readRDS(paste0(root.dir , "data/gene_selection__optional_PCA/" , system , "/" , current.file))
  return(as.character(out$gene))
})

genes_null = readRDS(paste0(root.dir , "data/gene_selection/" , system , "/" , "gene_selection.Rds"))
genes[[length(genes) + 1]] = as.character(genes_null$gene)
names(genes) = c(10,100,25,50,0)


```


# Neighborhood preservation score (per cell)

```{r cell-score, message = FALSE}


samples = unique(sce$sample)
hvgs_10000 = get_hvgs(sce, n = 10000)
neighs.all = lapply(samples , function(sample){
  current.sce = sce[, sce$sample == sample]
  current.neighs.all = get_mapping(current.sce , genes = hvgs_10000, batch = NULL, n.neigh = "all", nPC = 50 , get.dist = T , type = "together")
  distances = current.neighs.all$distances
  distances_scaled = t( apply(distances , 1 , function(x) scale(x)) )
  rownames(distances_scaled) = rownames(distances)
  current.neighs.all$distances = distances_scaled
  return(current.neighs.all)
})
names(neighs.all) = samples


stat_cell_score = bplapply(n_genes.grid , function(n_genes){
  stat.per_n_genes = lapply(1:length(genes) , function(i){
    current.genes = genes[[i]][1:n_genes]
    current.stat = lapply(samples , function(sample){
      current.sce = sce[, sce$sample == sample]
      current.neighs.all = neighs.all[[which(names(neighs.all) == sample)]]
      current.stat = suppressWarnings( get_preservation_score_simple(current.sce , neighs.all = current.neighs.all , genes.all = rownames(current.sce) , 
                                  genes.compare = current.genes, batch = NULL, n.neigh = 5 , nPC.all = 50 , nPC.compare = 50) )
    })
    current.stat = do.call(rbind , current.stat)
    
    current.stat$type = names(genes)[i]
    current.stat$n_genes = n_genes
    return(current.stat)
  })
  stat.per_n_genes = do.call(rbind , stat.per_n_genes)
  return(stat.per_n_genes)
}, BPPARAM = mcparam)
stat_cell_score = do.call(rbind , stat_cell_score)
saveRDS(stat_cell_score , file = paste0(root.dir , "data/benchmark_method/diff_nPC/" , system , "/cell_score.Rds"))



```

# Celltype mapping

```{r celltype-mapping, message = FALSE}


get_celltypes_stat = function(sce , genes , batch = "sample", n.neigh = 5){
  nPC = 2*length(unique(sce$celltype))
  neighs = suppressWarnings( get_mapping(sce , assay = "logcounts" , genes = genes, batch = batch, n.neigh = n.neigh, nPC = nPC , get.dist = F , type = "together"))
  if (!is.null(neighs)){
    meta = as.data.frame(colData(sce))
    current.mapping = data.frame(cell = rownames(neighs) ,
                               celltype = sapply(1:nrow(neighs) , function(i) meta$celltype[meta$cell == rownames(neighs)[i]]) ,
                               mapped_celltype = sapply(1:nrow(neighs), function(i) getmode(meta$celltype[match(neighs[i,] , meta$cell)] , 1:n.neigh) ))
    return(current.mapping)
  }
  else {
    return(NULL)
  }
}


stat_celltype = bplapply(n_genes.grid , function(n_genes){
  stat.per_n_genes = lapply(1:length(genes) , function(i){
    current.genes = genes[[i]][1:n_genes]
    current.stat = lapply(samples , function(sample){
      current.sce = sce[, sce$sample == sample]
      current.neighs.all = neighs.all[[which(names(neighs.all) == sample)]]
      current.stat = suppressWarnings( get_celltypes_stat(sce , current.genes , batch = "sample", n.neigh = 10 ) )
    })
    current.stat = do.call(rbind , current.stat)
    current.stat$type = names(genes)[i]
    current.stat$n_genes = n_genes
    return(current.stat)
  })
  stat.per_n_genes = do.call(rbind , stat.per_n_genes)
  return(stat.per_n_genes)
}, BPPARAM = mcparam)
stat_celltype = do.call(rbind , stat_celltype)
saveRDS(stat_celltype , file = paste0(root.dir , "data/benchmark_method/diff_nPC/" , system , "/celltype_classic.Rds"))



```

# Gene score

```{r gene-score, message = FALSE}


genes.predict = as.character(get_hvgs(sce , n = 5000))
hvgs_10000 = as.character(get_hvgs(sce , n = 5000))
stat_gene_score_all = suppressWarnings( get_distr_dist(sce, genes = hvgs_10000, assay = "logcounts" , batch = "sample" , n.neigh = 5 , nPC = 50 , genes.predict = genes.predict , type = "corr") ) 
colnames(stat_gene_score_all) = c("gene" , "corr_all")


stat_gene_score = bplapply(n_genes.grid , function(n_genes){
  stat.per_n_genes = lapply(1:length(genes) , function(i){
    current.genes = genes[[i]]
    current.stat = suppressWarnings( get_distr_dist(sce , current.genes[1:n_genes] , assay = "logcounts" , batch = "sample", n.neigh = 5 , nPC= 50 , genes.predict = genes.predict , type = "corr" ) )
    current.stat$n_genes = n_genes
    current.stat$p = names(genes)[i]
    return(current.stat)
  })
  stat.per_n_genes = do.call(rbind , stat.per_n_genes)
  return(stat.per_n_genes)
}, BPPARAM = mcparam)
stat_gene_score = do.call(rbind , stat_gene_score)
stat_gene_score = merge(stat_gene_score , stat_gene_score_all , all.x = T , all.y = F)
stat_gene_score$corr_ratio = stat_gene_score$corr/stat_gene_score$corr_all
saveRDS(stat_gene_score , file = paste0(root.dir , "data/benchmark_method/diff_nPC/" , system , "/gene_score.Rds"))


```
